name: The Crop Warrior
description:
Small game made for the Cozy Autumn Game Jam (2022)

The game is an action game where you fight through waves of enemies until you reach "The King", the crop thieves stole farmer Joe's crops ( :( ) and is your job as the crop warrior to defeat "The King" and return the stolen plants.

This is a rouguelike game, only one life until the final boss at room #50 (or #52 because of a bug I couldn't fix on time for the jam)

Really short game.

Controls:

<- -> (Move)

Space/Up arrow (Jump)

X/C (Main and Secondary hability (If you have one ;) ))

Esc (Close game)

Credits:

All art, music, audio and programming by Bored Cube (me)

Font by  Zacchary Dempsey-Plante

Notes:

- Because of lack of time, the intro and ending cutscenes are unskipable (also the death cutscene but that one is not as long)

- Sounds are unfinished due to the limit time

- Some enemies might be a little unbalanced
